name: Hello Kitty
description: The original icon. A cheerful girl who loves baking cookies and collecting cute things.

name: My Melody
description: A sweet bunny from Mariland who adores her red hood and her pet mouse, Flat.

name: Cinnamoroll
description: A fluffy white puppy with big blue eyes and a plump, sweet-smelling tail.

name: Kuromi
description: My Melody's rival, a mischievous imp who secretly loves romance novels.

name: Pompompurin
description: A golden retriever with a love for pudding and napping in cozy spots.

name: Keroppi
description: An energetic frog from Donut Pond who excels at swimming and baseball.

name: Badtz-Maru
description: A mischievous penguin with a spiky hairdo and a love for skateboarding.

name: Pochacco
description: A sporty white dog who enjoys playing soccer and hanging out with friends.

name: Chococat
description: A curious black cat with big ears and a love for gadgets and technology.

name: Little Twin Stars
description: Kiki and Lala, twin siblings from the stars who spread happiness and dreams wherever they go.
